ippoz.reload.featureselection

Class FeatureSelector

  • java.lang.Object
    • ippoz.reload.featureselection.FeatureSelector
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FeatureRanker, VarianceFeatureSelector

    public abstract class FeatureSelector
extends java.lang.Object
    The Class FeatureSelector. It allows to choose which features of a knowledge are worth analysing. It allows reducing the amount of data to be used, avoiding pollution of the results.
    Author:
    Tommy
